name: Siege of Unknown Farm
description:
this game was made for MechJam II, and the first game i ever made

you play as a potato girl, who protects her potato farm from mecha invaders, repurposing one of the mechas to fight back

the controls are arrow keys for movement, hold Q for potato's drill shot, W and S to aim the machine gun of the mech and E to shoot it

it's very short and barebones, i only had 8 or so days to make it since i entered the jam late

i also never made music before so this is 2 firsts, that's why the music sucks

it was a single-person effort, i made the game by myself

i hope you enjoy it at least
